content: At first, this article’s title did not grab me. In fact, it did the opposite. I am not a fan of censorship. I am, however, a fan of willpower, discretion, discernment, and professionalism. So, I decided to give it a go. I read the article. It’s worth reading. Instead of it anti-cussing it is pro-willpower. I am going to give it a try. Thanks for this thoughful piece.
